name: Karate Krab
description: Karate Krab is a 2.5D action platformer about a crab who was abandoned by his cast, seeking revenge in the form of Karate!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.3+ GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 2GB/AMD Radeon 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: MSI R9 280 3GB/GeForce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
